Meet Our Officer Team 2025-2026

Our officer team is dedicated to leading our chapter with passion and commitment. Each member brings unique skills and experiences to help our chapter thrive.

Executive Council

President - Junhui Park

Hi! My name is Junhui Park, I'm a senior, and I'm your FBLA president! Outside of FBLA, I love going to cafes, listening to music, and playing flute. I'm so excited for the year ahead and can't wait to lead our chapter to success!

Advisers

Commander Schenk

Commander Schenk is a retired U.S. Navy officer with a passion for mentoring students. He has been an invaluable resource for our chapter, providing guidance and support.

Coach Gray is one of our advisers this year.
